publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-5994 Angela Constance: Prostate Cancer Awareness Month—That the Parliament acknowledges March as prostate cancer awareness month; notes with great concern the rising number of men being diagnosed with prostate cancer as a result of an ageing population, and praises the efforts of organisations such as the West Lothian Group for Prostate Cancer Support in the Livingston constituency, which has made great strides in spreading awareness about prostate cancer as well as providing quality support to community members with prostate cancer and their loved ones. Supported by: John Wilson*, Rob Gibson*, Dave Thompson*, Jackie Baillie*, Alasdair Allan*, Anne McLaughlin*, Stuart McMillan*, Shirley-Anne Somerville*, Kenneth Gibson*, Willie Coffey*, Sandra White*, Joe FitzPatrick*, Elaine Smith*, Brian Adam*, Bill Butler*, Hugh Henry*, Bill Kidd*, Stewart Maxwell*, Hugh O’Donnell*, Jim Hume*, Bob Doris*, Ken Macintosh*, Jackson Carlaw*

S3M-5994 Angela Constance: Prostate Cancer Awareness Month—That the Parliament acknowledges March as prostate cancer awareness month; notes with great concern the rising number of men being diagnosed with prostate cancer as a result of an ageing population, and praises the efforts of organisations such as the West Lothian Group for Prostate Cancer Support in the Livingston constituency, which has made great strides in spreading awareness about prostate cancer as well as providing quality support to community members with prostate cancer and their loved ones. Supported by: John Wilson, Rob Gibson, Dave Thompson, Jackie Baillie, Alasdair Allan, Anne McLaughlin, Stuart McMillan, Shirley-Anne Somerville, Kenneth Gibson, Willie Coffey, Sandra White, Joe FitzPatrick, Elaine Smith, Brian Adam, Bill Butler, Hugh Henry, Bill Kidd, Stewart Maxwell, Hugh O’Donnell, Jim Hume, Bob Doris, Ken Macintosh, Jackson Carlaw, Cathy Peattie*, Mary Scanlon*
S3M-5994 Prostate Cancer Awareness Month (lodged on 18 March 2010) Margaret Mitchell*
